version_description:
- Now pay your credit card outstanding in 3 simple steps
- View transactions made on your card in past 24 months
- Easily update your email id and mobile no.
- Place requests for the below mentioned services:
o Generate your new PIN instantly
o Block lost/stolen cards
o Reissue or replace your card
o Apply for an Add-on Card
o Activate international Usage
o Subscribe for E-statement
o Duplicate Statements
and more
- Track status of all the service requests placed on your card
- Bug Fixes (Black patch issue etc)

- Now pay your credit card outstanding in 3 simple steps
- View transactions made on your card in past 24 months
- Easily update your email id and mobile no.
- Place requests for the below mentioned services:
o Generate your new PIN instantly
o Block lost/stolen cards
o Reissue or replace your card
o Apply for an Add-on Card
o Activate international Usage
o Subscribe for E-statement
o Duplicate Statements
and more
- Track status of all the service requests placed on your card
- Bug Fixes (Black patch issue etc)

- Performance Improvements and bug fixes
- Update your office address through your Mobile App

- Performance Improvements and bug fixes
- Update your office address through your Mobile App

- Touch ID for login: Login to your SBI Card Account using Touch ID authentication (feature available on all touch id enabled devices)
- Enhanced security: Link your mobile device with your SBI Card login account for enhanced security
- Pre-filled user id: You no longer need to enter user id after linking your login account with the mobile device
- Other minor enhancements & improvements

- Touch ID for login: Login to your SBI Card Account using Touch ID authentication (feature available on all touch id enabled devices)
- Enhanced security: Link your mobile device with your SBI Card login account for enhanced security
- Pre-filled user id: You no longer need to enter user id after linking your login account with the mobile device
- Other minor enhancements & improvements

Introducing SCAN TO PAY feature:
- Make payments at Bharat QR enabled merchants from your mobile device. Simply Scan the Bharat QR from your SBI Card App and make payment from your Visa Card.
- MPIN for Login: Login to your SBI Card Account using a 4 digit PIN
- Issues related to Touch ID based login have been resolved

Introducing SCAN TO PAY feature:
- Make payments at Bharat QR enabled merchants from your mobile device. Simply Scan the Bharat QR from your SBI Card App and make payment from your Visa Card.
- MPIN for Login: Login to your SBI Card Account using a 4 digit PIN
- Issues related to Touch ID based login have been resolved

1. Update Aadhaar Number : Link your Aadhaar number with your SBI Card
2. Introducing "Mailbox": Now you can raise your queries or complaints related to your card account, using Mailbox feature. All your interactions will be available in one click
3. Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

1. Update Aadhaar Number : Link your Aadhaar number with your SBI Card
2. Introducing "Mailbox": Now you can raise your queries or complaints related to your card account, using Mailbox feature. All your interactions will be available in one click
3. Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

- Enhanced security: Link your mobile device with your SBI Card login account for enhanced security

Introducing SCAN TO PAY feature:
- Make payments at Bharat QR enabled merchants from your mobile device. Simply Scan the Bharat QR from your SBI Card App and make payment from your Visa Card.
- MPIN for Login: Login to your SBI Card Account using a 4 digit PIN
- Issues related to Touch ID based login have been resolved

-All new and simplified Homescreen:
o Access all your important tasks from the quick access options
oView your latest card payment updates in real time
-Avail ‘Encash’ and ‘Easy Money Draft’ booking amounts directly in your bank account using NEFT feature
-New refreshed and easy to access ‘Services’ section
-Other simple changes to improve your SBI Card App experience

-All new and simplified Homescreen:
o Access all your important tasks from the quick access options
oView your latest card payment updates in real time
-Avail ‘Encash’ and ‘Easy Money Draft’ booking amounts directly in your bank account using NEFT feature
-New refreshed and easy to access ‘Services’ section
-Other simple changes to improve your SBI Card App experience

Access below exclusive services instantly
o Flexipay
o Balance Transfer on EMI
o Encash
o Easy Money
- Easily update your personal mailing address

Access below exclusive services instantly
o Flexipay
o Balance Transfer on EMI
o Encash
o Easy Money
- Easily update your personal mailing address

• Launching E STORE : Book your travel needs through the SBI Card App and avail special discounts
• Online Account Registration: Now you can create your login credentials, reset password & unlock username through SBI Card App
• Bug fixes

• Bug fixes
Bug fixes and some key improvements to enhance your user experience

Latest and faster UI as recommended for iOS 7, Interactive Hot Deals & Reward Catalogue.

Minor bug fix.
Minor bug fix.

-Discover offers available on SBI Card near your location
- Click on ‘Offers Near You’ to view available offers on SBI Credit Card
- View all Cashback offers, Discounts and limited period Deals available on your Card
-Manage Tokenized Payments - Set limits for payments using Card Tokenization Services (e.g. Samsung Pay, SBI Card Pay) for Transactions like NFC, Bharat QR, In-app, MST, etc.
-Performance improvement and bug fixes

-Discover offers available on SBI Card near your location
- Click on ‘Offers Near You’ to view available offers on SBI Credit Card
- View all Cashback offers, Discounts and limited period Deals available on your Card
-Manage Tokenized Payments - Set limits for payments using Card Tokenization Services (e.g. Samsung Pay, SBI Card Pay) for Transactions like NFC, Bharat QR, In-app, MST, etc.
-Performance improvement and bug fixes

- Manage your card usage
o Activate/ Deactivate your International spends
o Manage card usage for Domestic Online and International Online transactions based on your spends pattern

- Insurance
o Comprehensive solutions against uncertainties in life
o Secure your life and assets with insurance policies from top Insurance providers

- Performance improvement and bug fixes

- Manage your card usage
o Activate/ Deactivate your International spends
o Manage card usage for Domestic Online and International Online transactions based on your spends pattern

- Insurance
o Comprehensive solutions against uncertainties in life
o Secure your life and assets with insurance policies from top Insurance providers

- Performance improvement and bug fixes

• Quick Setup – A feature to help new SBI Cardholders, to easily set-up their account
• Security features added to make your card account more secure
• Performance improvement and bug fixes

• Quick Setup – A feature to help new SBI Cardholders, to easily set-up their account
• Security features added to make your card account more secure
• Performance improvement and bug fixes

Managing your SBI Card usage, now simple & secure!
- Manage international & domestic transactions on your card
- Activate/Deactivate usage for Online, Contactless, ATM & POS transactions on your card
- Modify usage limits for all transaction types based on your needs
- Click on ‘Services’ > ‘Manage Card Usage’ to set your usage preference

Managing your SBI Card usage, now simple & secure!
- Manage international & domestic transactions on your card
- Activate/Deactivate usage for Online, Contactless, ATM & POS transactions on your card
- Modify usage limits for all transaction types based on your needs
- Click on ‘Services’ > ‘Manage Card Usage’ to set your usage preference

- Viewing Rewards Summary is much easier now. Cardholders can view reward points balance from the homepage dashboard
- Cardholders can apply for an additional SBI Credit Card with minimal documentation requirements and get approval within few minutes. This offer shall be available for select Cardholders based on internal policies
- Few smaller enhancements and bug fixes to improve the App performance
